recipesJson.name: Cinnamon Cereal
recipesJson.author: tw2k
recipesJson.description:
A cinnamon crunch cereal with marshmallows. 
Cinnamon Crunch (Flavorah) is a fantastic standalone flavor. This recipe builds on it with Cream for some milky creaminess, Marshmallow for sweetness, and 1 drop Rich Cinnamon per 15ml. All the additional flavors are optional.
